channel.title: Vanity | VPS HOSTED 24/7 | A TON OF BOSSES | [PI] | PKING | ECO
channel.description:
Hello people of MoparScape today i would like to show you an amazing sever that has just been released to the public Vanity, We have a Vbulletin forums which is 100% Secure you can check out Vanity at [url=http://www.vanity-ps.com]Vanity - Where Dreams Become A Reality[/url]
-FEATURES- - vps Hosted NO LAG -::FFA/ free for all area -Bounty Hunter with Targets/Special drops with EP% - Amazing Pking - Flawless Switching - Amazing And Dedicated Staff - No Dupes Or Bugs -Amazing duel arena no Dupes/Bugs - Tons of Minigames - Pkpoints Package/ Donator Pin - Tons of Bosses for PVMing - Amazing combat system - Tons of items 317 fitted. - Project Insanity - Tons of skills you can acomplish - Nex Armour/Chaotics/Primal - Amazing Slayer with rewards - Great Economy - Donator Island/Donator Island Expansion - Fast Cache Download - 9 Character Ranks -Amazing PKP shop -Amazing Vote Shop/ With Tickets - A ton of more features in-game!
Now for some actually in-game pictures
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/314sfoz.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2vskd2q.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/309hpv5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/140w2og.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/153xi7n.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/keu8h1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/34g0u83.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/mikuug.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2cyr2c6.jpg[/img]
We hope to see you ingame at [url=http://www.vanity-ps.com]Vanity - Where Dreams Become A Reality[/url] make sure to tell your friends!
